tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    authority_id INT,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Cyberbullying_Complaints (
    complaint_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP,
    authority_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Complaint_Updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_type VARCHAR(20),
    update_text TEXT,
    date_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_complaints (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   complaint_text VARCHAR(255),
   complaint_date DATE,
   is_resolved BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50),
   email VARCHAR(100),
   is_admin BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE authorities (authority_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   authority_name VARCHAR(50),
   email VARCHAR(100),
   phone_number VARCHAR(15))

CREATE TABLE complaints_status (complaint_id INT,
   status VARCHAR(20),
   update_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE complaint_attachments (attachment_id INT,
   complaint_id INT,
   attachment_url VARCHAR(255),
   upload_date DATE)
